title: Fair-Feathered Friends (feat. Boston Symphony Orchestra)
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Recorded live at Tanglewood with members of the Boston Symphony Orchestra and an all-star cast, this Burmese folktale imagines why the thrush's colors are in its voice, not its feathers.
itunes:author: WBUR
